dialogue.introduction: Akizuki-class anti-air destroyer, first ship, Akizuki. I'm reporting in here. Please leave it to me!
dialogue.library_intro: Designed for the fleet's anti-air, Type-B first class destroyer, Akizuki-class 1st destroyer, Akizuki. As an anti-air ship equipped with 4x 8-barrel Long 10cm guns and anti-aircraft fire director, along with Hatsuzuki and the others, we formed the 61st DesDiv. I'll do my best!
dialogue.secretary2: My long 10cm guns and anti-aircraft fire director. With this power, I'll definitely protect the fleet!
dialogue.secretary3: Choujuusenchihou-chan, don't struggle! Eh, huh? Ad...miral? Ahh! Please excuse me!
dialogue.secretaryidle: Long 10cm, check! Anti-aircraft fire director, check! Oxygen torpedoes, check... alright! Everything's perfect! Umm, next is...
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commander, thanks as always. This Akizuki will protect the fleet, and you. Yeah, it's alright!
dialogue.wedding: Commander, did you call me? Um, was my anti-air inadequate? That's not it? Then does it have to do with Shoukaku-san? Not that either? ...Howaa~, could this be... T-thank you very much!
dialogue.show_players_score: That's true. It's important to know what the fleet knows!
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Anti-air destroyer, Akizuki. Prepared to sortie.
dialogue.equipment2: With this, I won't lose to the enemy fleet!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: J-just for a bit, I'll take a break...
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: My anti-air fire director too, I need to firmly attach it...
dialogue.docking_complete: It seems that the under repairing ship leaves dock.
dialogue.ship_construction: It seems like a new ship was born!
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet has safely returned. Everyone, good work!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: 61st DesDiv, setting sail immediately. Setting off!
dialogue.battle_start: Now, shall we begin? Begin firing!
dialogue.attack: While this Akizuki still has strength, I won't let you!
dialogue.night_battle: Akizuki's night battle, shall I show it to you?
dialogue.night_attack: I feel like... the barrage is light. Barrage!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: I feel like... the barrage is light. Barrage!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: I feel like... the barrage is light. Barrage!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: I feel like... the barrage is light. Barrage!
dialogue.mvp: Akizuki protected the fleet. It's alright, next time, too, will be alright!
dialogue.minor_damaged1: Kugh! I can still go on!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Defending against torpedo attack! It's alright !
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Not yet... I won't sink yet! The fleet's anti-air... I will-!
dialogue.sunk: Shoukaku-san... Taihou-san... are you well? Ugh..., alright... the fleet is... alri... ght...
dialogue.christmas_2014: Merry Christmas, Commander! I roasted a turkey...oh! I shouldn't have? Why?!
dialogue.new_year_2015: Happy New Year. Commander, please treat me well this year too!
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Commander, congratulations on the two year anniversary! From now Akizuki will give her best in AA defense for the fleet!

hourly.0000: Commander, Akizuki will report the time. The current time is 0000!
hourly.0100: The 0100 report. Is this the right way, Commander?
hourly.0200: 0200. The moon tonight... the moon sure is beautiful, commander. Eh, commander?
hourly.0300: 0300, Commander. It's very quiet at this time. It's really quiet...
hourly.0400: 0400. Commander, are you not tired?　Let's have some strong tea.
hourly.0500: It is now 0500. Commander. Yes. Akizuki, prepared to wake everyone, roger!
hourly.0600: 0600. Good morning, Commander. Yes, it is a nice morning♪
hourly.0700: 0700. Commander, I'm preparing breakfast over here. I'm sorry that it's... simple.
hourly.0800: 0800. 61st DesDiv, sortie preparations complete. We can set sail at any time!
hourly.0900: 0900. The capital ship of the escort is a battleship? Carrier? Leave it to me!
hourly.1000: It's the 1000 report. Commander, I wish to properly complete the exercises as well.
hourly.1100: 1100. Commander, what will you have for lunch? Shall I prepare it for you?
hourly.1200: 1200. Commander, lunch is rice balls and pickled radish. Ah, sorry that it's simple...
hourly.1300: It is now 1300. Commander, I apologize. I'll try my best to prepare a wonderful dinner!
hourly.1400: 1400. I wonder how Hatsuzuki is... Ah, Commander. Let's do our best in the afternoon too!
hourly.1500: 1500. Ah, yes. I've been in the care of Akashi-san.
hourly.1600: 1600. Yes, I've attached an anti-air fire director on the stern as well. It's perfect!
hourly.1700: It's the 1700 report. The sun is setting, so the anti-aircraft watch is ending.
hourly.1800: It is now 1800. Yes, Akizuki will do her best to prepare a wonderful dinner!
hourly.1900: 1900! Piping hot barley and rice, pickled radish, also canned beef, and miso soup♪ How is it?
hourly.2000: 2000. Yes, today, I pushed myself a bit extra. How was I?
hourly.2100: 2100. Eh, Suzutsuki? Yes, she's a little sister I'm proud of. Ei!
hourly.2200: 2200. Ah, Shoukaku-san, Zuikaku-san. Good work. Yes, I'm alright!
hourly.2300: 2300. I was a bit nervous. Haa... Commander, very good work today.
